Getting rewarded for being bronze sounds quite ridiculous to me. They spent some time and effort to get where they are, I reckon they deserve it.

Honestly, as a business decision it makes no sense to give free shit to everyone. But even then, do people who play 10 games a year and get placed in bronze 5 really deserve anything. "If they get one I should." That's the everyone is a winner PC bullshit. You put in the work, you get somewhere, they'll reward you. So don't go looking for free shit, work for it.
